## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm interested in learning more about Verus DeFi and its approach to solving some common issues in DeFi. Can you tell me how the Verus DeFi protocol addresses the issues of miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running in currency conversions?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus DeFi protocol ensures that all currency conversions using a particular liquidity pool and mined into one block are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing the problems of miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running. This provides fee-based DeFi integrated incentives to miners and stakers, ensuring smooth consensus operation and fee conversion capabilities. By solving and pricing all conversions simultaneously, Verus DeFi eliminates the opportunity for miners to extract value through front-running or other manipulative tactics.

**User:**
That makes sense. I've also heard that Verus allows for the simultaneous launch of a blockchain and a bridge converter liquidity pool. Can you explain the significance of this?

**AI Assistant:**
When launching a new blockchain, Verus allows for the simultaneous launch of a fully decentralized or centralized "bridge" converter liquidity pool. This bridge converter liquidity pool runs on the new blockchain, and all fees generated via cross-chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain. This provides seamless connectivity between the new blockchain and the Verus ecosystem, enabling users to easily convert assets between chains and take advantage of the benefits of the Verus DeFi protocol.

**User:**
I'm also interested in learning more about Verus's approach to blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches. How does Verus ensure that these launches are successful, with minimum participation or automatic refunds?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus allows you to set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on-chain. If by the start time of your blockchain, minimums are not met, all participants will automatically get a refund of all of their pre-conversions, less the network fees. This ensures that crowdfunding currency launches are successful and participants are protected in case of insufficient participation.

**User:**
That's really interesting. What are some of the launch options provided by Verus for blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus provides several launch options for blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches, including setting maximum participation in one or more currencies, offering pre-launch discounts, providing price-neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies, and offering price-neutral carve-outs. These options provide flexibility and customization for crowdfunding currency launches on the Verus platform, allowing projects to tailor their launches to their specific needs and goals.

## Simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches
 - Launch of a world class, worldwide, merge-mineable blockchain along with a fully decentralized or centralized “bridge” converter liquidity pool as part of defining a new blockchain. Bridge converter currencies have the same flexibility as other fractional 100% asset backed or partially asset backed currencies, but is bound to the launch of the new blockchain, runs on the new blockchain, and all fees generated via cross chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, only seamless connectivity.

What are some of the launch options provided by Verus for blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches?

Verus provides several launch options for blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches, including:

* Setting maximum participation in one or more currencies
* Offering pre-launch discounts
* Providing price-neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies
* Offering price-neutral carve-outs

These options provide flexibility and customization for crowdfunding currency launches on the Verus platform.
